alert.note: Alert for Riverside (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 20 at 7:31PM PDT until August 20 at 11:30PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Diego has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... The El Dorado Fire burn scar in... Riverside County in southern California... * Until 1130 PM PDT. * At 731 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain over the El Dorado Fire Burn Scar. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Excessive rainfall over the burn scar will result in debris flow in the El Dorado Fire Burn Scar. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding in and around the El Dorado Fire Burn Scar. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the El Dorado Fire Burn Scar. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Beaumont, Banning, Morongo Indian Reservation and Cherry Valley. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the El Dorado Fire Burn Scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.
